channel.title: Portfolio on Andre Duarte | Software Developer

item.title: Incal
item.description: This project came from the need to have some WebGL integrated in my portfolio website.

item.title: Theremin
item.description: This project started with an interaction with one of the game developers that I follow on twitter.

item.title: Shopping COVID
item.description: A game about going shopping in the middle of a pandemic.

item.title: HoopsVR
item.description: This project was made during the course of Unity Junior Programmer Pathway.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: This project came from an idea that I’ve been exploring for a while, “What is like to have super powers in VR?

item.title: Checkers GL
item.description: This project was the final project of the discipline “Intelligent Systems” while I was studying in ISEC.

item.title: Billard GL
